title: out of my controll
body: if i get leaverbuster for this ima be pissed its ur damn client riot.

replies.body: It is actually not very common to get a generic "game has crashed" error message.  Does this happen consistently when you try to join a game, even a Custom Game?  Or is this the only time you have experienced an issue like this?
I tried repair but it didn't work. Tried to go into a custom game and still nothing.
ill see what happens when i uninstall and reinstall the game
i tried uninstalling as well as uninstalling all league related stuff like lol recorder and your screen saver software then reinstalling it and none of it worked

Sorry for the late response!  I replied to your issue in your new thread found [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/cRv9nnFP-so-yall-just-guna-ignore-the-population-having-this-problem?comment=0001).

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=7xLdQ1O2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-18T20:10:33.666+0000)
>
> It is actually not very common to get a generic "game has crashed" error message.  Does this happen consistently when you try to join a game, even a Custom Game?  Or is this the only time you have experienced an issue like this?

when are yall guna fix this

i have never experienced this ever before i have tried multiple things i can't get into a custom game on any map i cant get into aram not 3v3s not even ranked to fix it nothing works ive
1) restarted the client like u saw in the video
2) tried goin into a custom with my firewall off
3 )tried running the game as admin
4) restarted my computer
5) restarted my router
6) repaired the client 
none of these work and i've tried all multiple times the game is still doing the same thing right now i was hoping to play after work too :( its really upsetting that i also lost 20LP from this
Same happend to me. Cant recconect
the exact same crap is happening to me ever since i downloaded patch 6.10 like as we speak my ranked team is going in 4v5 because my client keeps crashing like this, and its never happened before
ive reinstalled today also and it didnt change a thing
I have the same porblem until the patch came out. And it still dont work after i reinstalled it.
same thing is happening to me it was all ok untill the patch came out
yes it was fine untill the patch came out
